summary: During Microsoft's Build developer conference in Seattle, Washington, a disruptive incident occurred when an employee protested against the company's cloud and AI contracts with the Israeli government. The protest took place while CEO Satya Nadella was on stage delivering his keynote address. The employee's actions briefly interrupted the event and drew attention to the controversial nature of Microsoft's business dealings. The incident highlighted the challenges faced by tech companies when navigating complex geopolitical issues. Microsoft has not yet issued a formal response to the disruption, but it underscores the growing importance of corporate responsibility and ethical considerations in the tech industry.
title: Microsoft employee disrupts Satya Nadellaâ€™s Build conference keynote

summary: A group of 141 high-profile organizations, including Georgetown Law's Center on Privacy and Technology, the Southern Poverty Law Center, and the Alphabet Workers Union, have penned a letter to Congress warning against the potential dangers of a proposed bill by former President Donald Trump. The bill, dubbed the 'Big Beautiful Bill,' is criticized for its potential to enable "unfettered abuse" of artificial intelligence (AI). The signatories express concerns about the lack of safeguards and oversight in the bill that could lead to harmful consequences, particularly in the realm of privacy and civil rights. title: Trump's 'Big Beautiful Bill' would create 'unfettered abuse' of AI, 141 high-profile orgs warn in letter to Congress

summary: OpenAI, a prominent artificial intelligence research lab, has made a significant move by merging with Io, a company co-created by design guru Jony Ive and tech entrepreneur Sam Altman. This merger signals OpenAI's strategic focus on developing AI hardware, leveraging Ive's expertise in design and Altman's experience in the tech industry. The collaboration aims to advance the capabilities of AI systems by optimizing hardware components to work seamlessly with software algorithms. By bringing together design sensibilities and technical know-how, OpenAI and Io seek to push the boundaries of AI innovation and create more efficient and powerful AI solutions. This
title: OpenAI's Big Bet That Jony Ive Can Make AI Hardware Work
